subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Horses
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Neville Bardos, the horse who survived a barn fire last May, was named the international Horse of the Year for 2011 by the United States Equestrian Federation.
snippet: Neville Bardos, the horse who survived a barn fire last May, was named the international Horse of the Year for 2011 by the United States Equestrian Federation.
